com.xiaoleilu.hutool.convert

类 AbstractConverter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xiaoleilu.hutool.convert.AbstractConverter<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Converter<T>
    直接已知子类:
    ArrayConverter, BooleanArrayConverter, BooleanConverter, ByteArrayConverter, CalendarConverter, CharacterConverter, CharArrayConverter, CharsetConverter, ClassConverter, DateConverter, DateTimeConverter, DoubleArrayConverter, FloatArrayConverter, IntArrayConverter, LongArrayConverter, NumberConverter, PathConverter, PrimitiveConverter, ShortArrayConverter, SqlDateConverter, SqlTimeConverter, SqlTimestampConverter, StringConverter, TimeZoneConverter, URIConverter, URLConverter

    public abstract class AbstractConverter<T>
extends Object
implements Converter<T>
    抽象转换器，提供通用的转换逻辑，同时通过
    作者:
    Looly
